summary.span: 从 WSDL 文档处理数据协定消息的导入。

span.span: Handles the importation of data contract messages from WSDL documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当转换 WSDL 说明时， 将由 调用。The is invoked by the when converting a WSDL description. 它会检查 WSDL 文档，并生成内存中的说明，以便以后用于生成代码。It examines the WSDL documents and generates an in-memory description to be used later for code generation.
